messages:
Hey {role}, congratulations to {username}! They won ${prize} from {mode}.
<#123> is your guide if you want to join them.

Greetings {role}! Shoutout to {username} for conquering the challenge and winning ${prize} from {mode}!
If you want to join them, make sure to check out <#123>.

Hey {role}, amazing news! {username} just secured ${prize} in the {mode} mode!
Dive into the action by following <#123> and join them on this epic journey.

{role}, gather around! {username} has triumphed and won ${prize} from {mode}!
For those brave enough to join, <#123> will guide your path.

Attention {role}! Cheers to {username} for winning ${prize} in the {mode} mode!
Want to be part of the glory? <#123> is the place to start your adventure.

{role}, it's celebration time! {username} has claimed ${prize} from {mode}!
Embark on your own journey by following <#123> and join the ranks.

Hey {role}, let's give a round of applause to {username} for earning ${prize} in {mode}!
If you want to join the elite, <#123> is your next step.

{role}, great news! {username} has emerged victorious with ${prize} from {mode}!
Ready to challenge yourself? Head over to <#123> and join the quest.

{role}, let's celebrate! {username} just bagged ${prize} in the {mode} mode!

Exciting news, {role}! {username} has won ${prize} from {mode}!
